intro: Hoya gongshanica, commonly known as the Gongshan Wax Plant, is a species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asclepiadaceae and is characterized by its thick, fleshy leaves and clusters of star-shaped flowers. The plant produces fragrant, waxy flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. Hoya gongshanica is a climbing or trailing plant that thrives in bright, indirect light and well-draining soil. It is relatively low maintenance and popular among indoor gardeners for its ornamental value.
